pages.title: Pigment Pedestal
pages.text: The $(bold)Pigment Pedestal$() is the block where you can make most of the recipes for Pigment.$(br2)It requires air, or an inventory above it. To start crafting supply a redstone signal.

Most recipes require $(l:general/gemstone_powder)Gemstone Powder() as an ingredient.$(br2)The Pedestal also acts as a normal crafting table and can therefore also craft vanilla recipes.$(br2)You can use $(l:general/pedestal_crafting_template)Pedestal Crafting Templates$() to automate pigment and vanilla recipes.
